1: We're sorry to hear about your experience. We appreciate your feedback and will work on improving.
2: Thank you for your feedback. We're looking into ways to better our service.
3: We appreciate your feedback. We're glad you had an okay experience and will strive to improve.
4: Thank you for your positive feedback! We're happy you had a good experience with us.
5: We're thrilled to hear about your experience! Thank you for the wonderful feedback.
commentResponse: We value your input and take your feedback seriously. Thank you for taking the time to leave a comment with us.
